item.title: There are 3 incredible return functions in Python
item.description: Today we share with you 3 relatively cold knowledge The first one: the magic dictionary key some_dict = {} some_dict[5.5] = "Ruby" some_dict[5.0] = "JavaScript" some_dict[5] = "Python" Output: >>> some_dict[5.5] "Ruby" >>> some_dict[5.0] "Python" >>> some_dict[5] "Python" “Python” eliminates the existence of “JavaScript”? ðŸ’¡ Description: The Python dictionary determines whether two keys are identical by checking for key equality and comparing hash values.
